Madison BusRadar
$VERSION$
Database accurate as of $DB_NAME$.

BusRadar is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

Route paths and bus stop locations are accurate as of $DB_NAME$. Bus arrival estimates and bus locations are obtained on demand from the Madison Metro website. We assume no responsibility for this information.

The Priority R-Tree implementation is based on PRTree © 2008 Robert Olofsson.

BusRadar is in not produced by or in any way affiliated with Madison Metro Transit.

Thank you, and we hope that you enjoy your BusRadar experience!

Visit us online at busradarapp.com and on Twitter @busradar. Feedbacks & Fix requests welcomed. support@busradarapp.com
